profile:
Quality Potlight is a family owned and operated business that specializes in top quality CANADIAN APPROVED pot lights. Since our inception in 2009, Quality Pot lights has serviced well over 5,000 homes, offices and condos throughout Greater Toronto Area including: Downtown Toronto, Forest Hill, Rosedale, Yorkville, Royal York, Scarborough, East York, North York, Etobicoke, Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington, Vaughan, Brampton, Thornhill, Markham, Richmond Hill, Aurora, Stouffville, Pickering, Ajax & Newmarket. Our consistent level of high-quality work and dedication to ensuring that the needs of every client are met have allowed us to quickly grow into a leader in quality potlight installation. We understand that your home is the largest investment you will ever make and are willing to go above and beyond perfection to ensure that you are satisfied.

ESA#: 7010623

Please visit www.qualitypotlight.ca

Been in business since 2009, Quality Potlight has the expertise and skills to accomplish a wide range of projects in your home. Our trained staff are exceptionally pleasant to deal with and are diligent in ensuring that that there is absolutely no mess or damage from our installation. 

At Quality Potlight we believe that the best way to build relationships is through integrity, performance, value, and client satisfaction. We strive to be a prominent provider of superior electrical services by constantly keeping our inventory updated with the latest innovative products as well as constantly focusing on improving the speed and service of our staff. All electrical works are done by our ESA certified and insured contractors who specialize in Pot light installation.

Toronto GTA, Brampton, Mississauga, Oakville, Milton, Richmond Hill, North York, Ajax, Peel Region, Markham, Newmarket, King City,  Vaughan, Scarborough, Woodbridge, Pickering, Thornhill, Barrie, Innisfil, Burlington.

Call 647-680-QLTY (7589) or 647-640- QLTY (7589)

www.qualitypotlight.ca
ESA#: 7010623
20 Amber Street Unit 7 Markham, ON L3R 5P4

profile:
Thank you for visiting Envirotech Insulation and Envirotech Electrical Services Inc.   
 
We are a dual service organization, offering a full range of electrical services for commercial and residential, along with specializing in retrofit wall insulation, attic insulation, and garage ceiling insulation applications. We also offer removal of insulation. 
 
Over 28 years licensed in the electrical trade, with experience in residential, commercial, industrial, microfit and net metering solar installations, backup generators, Generlink transfer switches, aluminum wiring.  A member of the ACP program for electrical contractors, we can take care of all your electrical needs.
 
**We were the preferred electrical contractor for HGTV's DECKED OUT during their last season.**
 
Envirotech Insulation specializes in installing cellulose in walls, cavities, knee walls, garage ceilings, attics, and other area that might be inaccessible without having to remove plaster, or drywall.  Through infrared we can identify problem areas of air leakage, and missing or lack of insulation to help suggest the proper recommendations for increasing the energy efficiency and comfort in your home. We also offer dense packed cellulose insulation for soundproofing/noise reduction applications. We ensure intake venting is appropriate from the soffits, and exhaust fan are connected properly.  
www.envirotechinsulation.ca
 
Please contact us for an estimate, and to learn more about the products and services we offer

profile:
Outdoor Lighting Perspectives is the world's largest full-service outdoor lighting company, and we are proud to have our fixtures enjoyed at more than 150,000+ homes across North America. 

Whatever your outdoor lighting needs, we have the experience and expertise to get it done right the first time.

WHAT WE DO:

We want to transform your outdoor living spaces in the best way possible. Some of our exquisite outdoor lighting options include:

-Accent lighting to subtly show off your propertyâ€™s best features
-Architectural lighting to highlight your homeâ€™s unique beauty
-Pool lighting to keep your nightly swims safe
-Patio and deck lights to add excitement to your nighttime entertaining
-Garden lighting to accentuate your stunning landscaping
-Path lighting to guide your guests where they need to go
-Up-lighting for home facade, trees, and outdoor artwork

From a single small garden that needs just a touch of light, to a sprawling estate home that needs lighting with zone control automation, we offer it all.

Call us today for a free at-home consultation, and one of our lighting designers will make a customs lighting design for your unique property.

WHAT MAKES US DIFFERENT:

We are dedicated outdoor lighting designers and installers. We do one thing, and we do it the best. We aren't a sprinkler company or lawn care company moonlighting in outdoor lights when times are slow. We will be here to take the call when your lights need maintenance years down the road.

We manufacture our lights by hand, mostly in the United States but some right here in Toronto, so we can control the entire chain of quality from raw materials to your beautiful garden. 

Our designers, installers, and service crews are all our own staff: we do not use sub-contractors. With Outdoor Lighting Perspectives, your satisfaction is guaranteed in writing and backed by our 30 year on-site warranty.

THE TRUSTWORTHY CHOICE:

How can you find an outdoor lighting contractor you can trust to get the work done right, on time, and safely? 

We have been independently vetted by a third-party for our complete and up-to-date liability insurance and workers compensation coverage, our safety and training compliance, and our long established track record of happy customer referrals and testimonials. 

Companies claiming to do lighting come and go, but we're celebrating 20 years and our warranty is backed by our international network of 60+ locations. We'll install your lights today, but we'll also maintain them for years to come.

THE NEXT STEP:

We offer free design consultations and free quotes. Please contact us to discuss your outdoor lighting needs and how we can be of assistance.

profile:
Our master electricians have gained over 30 years of experience. KCS Group LTD is an electrical company led by Kiarash Kasraie; the company has stayed in the family for generations.

Our primary focus is on electrical work; we perform high-quality electrical work for your comfort and safety so we can meet your needs and surpass your expectations.

As a well established general electrical company that catered towards residential and commercial clients, our business can offer work in a wide range of in all areas of electrical new installation, maintenance and repair.

GOALS

We work hard and are always looking to stay within our goals for the sake of our customers.

When you hire us, regardless of the price you pay us to work, we guarantee you quality. We always put quality into the task we do, so you are left satisfied with the work.

Weâ€™ve built excellent relations with our clients over the years, many of whom are repeat customers.

Our focus for our goals are:

To offer exemplary work
Customer satisfaction
Completing work on time
Healthy communication with our clients

With a proven track record, of hundreds of satisfied customers, Potlight Decor remains unrivaled in quality throughout Toronto and area.
With affordable and dependable roughing, wiring, trouble shooting, servicing, and installation Potlight Decor makes pot lights an affordable and cost effective lighting solution.
